DataElement.preferredName: Patient Prior Registration Laboratory Procedure Bone Marrow Eligibility Determination Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date related to assessment of the soft, sponge-like tissue in the center of bones that produces white blood cells, red blood cells, and platelets for person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment prior to the act of enrolling on a clinical trial as a determination of the suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Prior Registration Laboratory Procedure Bone Marrow Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to assessment of the soft, sponge-like tissue in the center of bones that produces white blood cells, red blood cells, and platelets for person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment prior to the act of enrolling on a clinical trial as a determination of the suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Prior Registration Laboratory Procedure Bone Marrow Eligibility Determination
Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled.:Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.:The soft, sponge-like tissue in the center of bones that produces white blood cells, red blood cells, and platelets.:Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled.
Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.
The tissue occupying the spaces of bone. It consists of blood vessel sinuses and a network of hematopoietic cells which give rise to the red cells, white cells, and megakaryocytes.
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: NCCTG CRF:North Central Cancer Treatment Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
